text: Naxie anzuo jiazhong de xinshi, yu yong ziji de caichan he shengming wei an la zhi dao zhandou zhe shi bu xiangdeng de [zhu], you canji zhe liwai. An la ci gei yong ziji de caichan he shengming [wei an la zhi dao] zhandou zhe you yu anzuo jiazhong zhe yi ji. An la yingxu mei zhong ren youmei de baochou, chu anzuo jiazhong zhe suo shou ci de baochou wai, an la hai ci gei zhandou zhe juda de baochou.
